message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper addresses the problem of describing visual contents of a video sequence with natural language, which is a task related to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The proposed method involves a novel encoder-decoder-reconstructor architecture, which is a deep learning model and falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of reinforcement learning for fine-tuning the model, which is a subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper deals with video captioning, which is a task related to multimedia (cs.MM).
